website_summaries.verdict: Affordable LED light therapy that works for various skin concerns including acne. An affordable, easy-to-use device.
pros: Delivers blue and red LED light to kill bacteria that can lead to acne
May also minimize the appearance of fine lines
Easy to operate - only require 2 minutes per treatment area and can be used 3 times daily
cons: Some longevity concerns, as some lights quit working after several uses

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After a week of using it, it turned off. So I changed the batteries, and it won’t work. Every time I turn it on, the lights would turn on then off right away and make a weird beeping noise. Changed the batteries again, and it’s doing the same thing. Sad that I wasted money on this.
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this time before I wrote the review. I was skeptical however, this really does aid in reducing the time it takes for blemishes to heal. I had a few stubborn spots from hormonal acne and this seemed to help them heal (or at the least, helps make the spots more receptive to the serums I use). Is it a miracle worker instantly? No. Does it reduce the size and healing time? Definitely. For the price, it’s well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I think it works. I usually use it at ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it works. I usually use it at night after washing off my makeup right before bed. I would say my pimples clear up 2-3 days quicker. Only thing that could improve is battery life, but they can't control that much.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Walker

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after three times.
customer_reviews.text: This item seemed to be working while it worked. But today the OUT button became stuck and the power is locked on a 1. I can't return it now, so am really irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy User

customer_reviews.title: be great if it would turn on
customer_reviews.text: i used this on my teen’s face for about a week or two and it seemed to work however got sidetracked with its use for several months. a tried using it again this week and after two days of use, it stopped working. thought it was batteries but after changing them, it still doesn’t stay on. disappointed because it seemed promising.
customer_reviews.author: jessithek

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was working when I first received it ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was working when I first received it but I can’t tell anymore. I still use it in breakouts just to be safe but I wish it wasn’t so noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try, right!! No one likes breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I think it works? Luckily I have pretty good skin so I haven’t had to use this a whole lot. I think this product works, at the very least it shortens the lifetime of a breakout
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: It was working great the product, I Change the batteries after 3 Days because it stopped working and I put new batteries! Now it works and it does the work!!
customer_reviews.author: Renata Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Works really good
customer_reviews.text: I had this device for a week and my acne is gone but tiny spots remain it really does work.The bright purple light is strong you can feel something after using this.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Review

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two for my teen grand kids and this product really works. Now if you have really bad acne , this is not for you. for emergency break outs two or three this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Noya

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Well, it works. It shortens the life of a zit. I need two zaps at a time per zit.
customer_reviews.author: James C. James

customer_reviews.title: This really does make your acne clear up faster. ...
customer_reviews.text: This really does make your acne clear up faster. I have stubborn acne on my chin that I swear will never go away, but at least with this handy little gadget, the acne doesn't last as long as it used to. For that I have to give this 5 stars. I can travel with it, too. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Clears acne quickly without having to pop any zits and don't have to worry about red marks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product and NO customer service response.
customer_reviews.text: Product would not initially run on batteries supplied with it. Finally got it to work and the clear cover (over the lights) popped off and won't stay on- left a message with the customer support number inside the miniature owner's manual. 48 hours later and NO ONE has returned my call. NOT SATISFIED with product or customer service!
customer_reviews.author: VA customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bath brush!!
customer_reviews.text: Great seller... great brush, very high quality and it arrived fast!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I liked it but..
customer_reviews.text: It was great for the three days it worked. I read the reviews and went ahead and bought the product knowing it had a reputation of just quitting working. It lived up to that reputation. After three days of use it cut out and never turned back on again. Customer service is none existant so I'm just getting a refund. Spend your money elsewhere on a light therapy gadget that works
customer_reviews.author: melzy716

customer_reviews.title: So Far I Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have some vague recollection that I had something similar that died quickly...so I'm cautious. But I could be wrong or this could be an update. Because so far this has been working GREAT and it’s easy to use. The technology is proven to work. It helps to heal open wounds and causes cystic spots deep under the skin to surface so you can resolve them.
customer_reviews.author: vsajewel

customer_reviews.title: I used it for newly pimple and it is wonderful that the size and inflammation foes down quickly in ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I would give it a 4 star, I used it for newly pimple and it is wonderful that the size and inflammation foes down quickly in as fast as 12 hours. love it, but I have to use acne clear or differin gel after use of pulsaderm to work.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kusin

customer_reviews.title: Acne light
customer_reviews.text: Received the unit place the batteries it came with and would not work. Replaced batteries sees to work bit looks like it sticks at others. Hope it works for my kids. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: G. Macias

customer_reviews.title: Stops working in less than 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: This tool worked great, unfortunately it died after less than 10 uses. I’ve tried switching out the batteries multiple times, and it still won’t work. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter and she absolutely loves the results she is seeing. This would make a great gift for anyone who suffers from occasional breakouts!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Read

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget.
customer_reviews.text: Love this gadget. Have been using it for a while. Helps my breakouts to clear much, much faster. Very convenient to take with you when travel a lot like I am.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Young

product_meta.title: Pulsaderm ACE - Acne Clearing Eraser LED Therapy (FDA Cleared) - Red and Blue LED
product_meta.description:
Color:White

Acne is a normal part of life and almost everybody experiences an outbreak here and there, but sometimes it can be a bother. Look your best with the Pulsaderm A.C.E.!

A.C.E. stands for Acne Clearing Eraser and is a revolutionary way of clearing out inflamed bumps on the skin. The A.C.E. looks like a small handheld flashlight, but it can really brighten your face! Great for mild to moderate acne, the Pulsaderm A.C.E works by using a combination of blue and red LED lights. These lights are directly applied onto the inflamed area on the skin. Exposure to certain wavelengths of blue and red light produces free radicals that help eliminate acne-causing bacteria. This leads to blemish-free skin, as the red light promotes healing and helps prevent future breakouts, while the blue light actively kills the bacteria that cause acne. This product is great for use on sensitive skin and won’t cause any redness or skin dehydration.

To get the most out of this light treatment device, wash and dry your face to remove any dirt and oil. Press the on/off button, then gently place the light panel over the blemish and hold it in place for two minutes. Continue this process until you have treated all target areas on your face. The A.C.E. will automatically turn off after two minutes, but you can easily turn it back on to move on to the next treatment area. When you’re done, you may apply your choice of moisturizer and sunscreen to keep your face protected and nourished. Also, clean-up is a breeze! Simply dab the device with an alcohol and it will be ready for the next treatment. Repeat this process three times a day for the best results!

FDA cleared, the Pulsaderm A.C.E. doesn’t use any chemicals and is a non-invasive way to fight against acne and pimples. It won’t leave behind any blemishes or scars, making it great for daily care! Zap zits with the Acne Clearing Eraser from Pulsaderm!
feature_bullets: FDA CLEARED– This LED Light Therapy device is cleared for use by the FDA and is completely safe for individuals age 14 and up. The A.C.E. won’t harm your skin, since it doesn’t use any chemicals and is non-invasive. Pulsaderm A.C.E. is FDA CLEARED to treat mild to moderate acne.

LED LIGHT THERAPY – The Pulsaderm A.C.E. uses a combination of blue and red LED lights to attack acne-causing bacteria under the skin while preventing any future breakouts and speeding up the healing process.

CHEMICAL FREE – This type of acne treatment doesn’t involve any chemicals that may cause negative skin reactions. Unlike some creams, lotions, gels, and more, the A.C.E. won’t leave your skin with a long-lasting dry feeling.

EASY OPERATION – Powered by 3 AAA alkaline batteries, the Pulsaderm A.C.E. doesn’t require any other accessories. Press the button to begin treatment, then gently place the light panel over the affected area and hold it in place for two minutes.

HOME ACNE TREATMENT – If acne is stressing you out, then try out the Pulsaderm A.C.E. LED Light Therapy! Best used for mild to moderate acne, it effectively clears out pimples from the inside, giving you immediate results that are totally safe.
